--------------------
<Text: Al-Rayah Mosque (Arabic: مسجد الراية‎ , 'Mosque of the flag' ‎ ), or Dzubab Mosque, is a mosque located in Medina, Saudi Arabia.>

Triplets:<Al-Rayah Mosque
1:
ere are the extracted triplets:

<Al-Rayah mosque
2:
--------------------
Text: Al-Rayah mosque:  It is narrated that there was a dome of the Islamic Prophet Muhammad installed in this area at the time of the Battle of the Trench, so it was named as Al-Rayah, which means battle flag.
Triplets:<Al-Rayah
3:
--------------------
<Text: Al-Rayah mosque:  The mosque is also called the Dzubab Mosque because it is attributed to a Yemeni man who came to Medina during the time of Governor Marwan bin al-Hakam and killed one of the government officials.>

Triplets:<Al-Rayah mosque
4:
--------------------
Text: Al-Rayah mosque:  He was later executed and crucified on Mount Dzubab.
Triplets:<Al-Rayah mosque
